.. emulation_tools_:

Emulation Tools
===============

``fv3fit.emulation`` contains a shared set of tools to help build and prototype ML models for emulation.  Currently this contains tooling around data handling (link to data), and (in the future) layers for tensorflow models.

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Contents

    emulation_data
    emulation_layers
